content: व्यापद् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To die, perish. {@--2@} To come down (to the earth), fall down. {@--3@} To be inaudible (as a sound). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To kill, slay. {@--2@} To hurt, injure, spoil.
व्यापद् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Calamity, misfortune, affliction; <ls>Māl. 9. 36</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 105.</ls> {@--2@} Disease. {@--3@} Derangement. {@--4@} Death, decease.
